attributes.action: re-enstatement of origional N213 bus route
attributes.additional_details: We want the return of the N213. It was removed because it was said not enough people used it, this was not the case! The people that did use the service just didnt pay for it!!!

rejection.details: The petition doesn't mention where in the country this route used to run.  It's reinstatement would be a matter for the relevant local authority.
